sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { formatTimeLoggedIn, formatVideoWatched } from './utils'; const SummaryCards = ({ state: { questionsAnswered, videoWatched, notesTaken, totalTimeLoggedIn, lastLogIn, loginTimeCode, onTimePercentage }, active }) => (

  • Questions Answered

    {active ? questionsAnswered : '0'}

  • Video Watched

    {formatVideoWatched(videoWatched)} 0

  • Notes Taken

    {active ? notesTaken : '0'}

  • Total Time Logged In

    {formatTimeLoggedIn(totalTimeLoggedIn)} 0

  • Last Log In

    {lastLogIn} {loginTimeCode} none

  • On-Time Percentage

    {onTimePercentage}% not available
); SummaryCards.propTypes = { state: PropTypes.object.isRequired, active: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, }; export default SummaryCards;
